display_name: Create or Modify System Process: Launch Agent

atomic_tests.name: Launch Agent
atomic_tests.description: Create a plist and execute it

executor.name: bash

input_arguments.description: Name of file to store in cron folder

dependencies.description: The shared library must exist on disk at specified location (#{path_malicious_plist})
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f #{path_malicious_plist} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo "The shared library doesn't exist. Check the path"; exit 1;

atomic_tests.name: Event Monitor Daemon Persistence
atomic_tests.description: This test adds persistence via a plist to execute via the macOS Event Monitor Daemon.

input_arguments.description: Path where to move the evil plist
Random name of the empty file used to trigger emond service

atomic_tests.name: Launch Agent - Root Directory
atomic_tests.description: Create a plist and execute it

executor.name: bash

input_arguments.description: Name of file to store in cron folder

dependencies.description: The shared library must exist on disk at specified location (#{path_malicious_plist})
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f #{path_malicious_plist} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo "The plist file doesn't exist. Check the path and try again."; exit 1;
